title: Lisa's Halloween Surprise
description: Lisa’s best friend Maggie has somehow convinced her to wear the most scandalous costume to the company’s annual Halloween party. How does she always manage to do that? Would the men she's secretly longing for notice her? For one night she has the chance to be someone else, if she's brave enough to take a chance.Marcus and Tobias have both been dreaming for years of one woman. Will she finally be brave enough to take a step in their direction? Can they convince her to touch them with the same intensity they see in her eyes when she thinks they aren't looking?
author: S.R. Roddy
